citations.narrative:
Item Facilities General 3.125
At the time of inspection the opossum shelter had exposed screws which could injure the animal
Facility needs to remove screws so as to protect the animals from injury.
Correct by close of business 8/6/14

narrative:
3.125(a)
FACILITIES, GENERAL.   
Item Facilities General 3.125
At the time of inspection the opossum shelter had exposed screws which could injure the animal
Facility needs to remove screws so as to protect the animals from injury.
